en.title: Feline Cognitive Dysfunction: Symptoms and Home Care Tips
en.content:
Cats can also experience cognitive decline as they age. It is important to know the symptoms and coping strategies for feline cognitive dysfunction.

Key Symptoms (DISHA)

D = Disorientation (getting lost in rooms, staring at walls), I = altered Interactions (reduced response to owners), S = Sleep cycle changes (day-night reversal, nighttime vocalization), H = House soiling (eliminating outside the litter box), A = Activity changes (wandering, lethargy). If multiple symptoms are observed, cognitive dysfunction may be the cause.

Home Care Strategies

Avoid major changes to the living environment (furniture arrangement, etc.), use nightlights for reassurance at night, maintain a consistent daily routine, provide moderate play and stimulation to keep the brain active, and use food puzzles to promote cognitive function.

Veterinary Support

If you notice concerning symptoms, consult your veterinarian. Supplements (DHA, Vitamin E, etc.) or prescription cognitive support diets may be available. It is also important to rule out other conditions (thyroid disease, hypertension, etc.).

zh.title: 猫的认知功能障碍：症状与家庭护理方法
zh.content:
猫在年老后也可能出现认知功能下降的情况。了解认知功能障碍的症状和应对方法非常重要。

主要症状（DISHA）

D=定向障碍（在房间里迷路、盯着墙壁看），I=社交互动改变（对主人反应减少），S=睡眠周期变化（昼夜颠倒、夜间嚎叫），H=排泄失常（在猫砂盆外排泄），A=活动量变化（徘徊、精神萎靡）。如果观察到多种症状同时出现，可能是认知功能障碍。

家庭护理方法

不要大幅改变生活环境（家具摆放等），夜间开小夜灯给予安全感，保持规律的生活作息，通过适度的玩耍和刺激活化大脑，使用益智喂食器刺激认知功能。

动物医院的诊疗

如果症状令人担忧，请咨询兽医。有时可以使用营养补充剂（DHA、维生素E等）或认知功能辅助处方粮。排除其他疾病（甲状腺疾病、高血压等）的鉴别诊断也很重要。
